email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider moving to the mid-40s ($45.50 per ton)? Also, can we confirm the laycan is firm? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but the current market is quite tight. The best I can do is $48.75 per ton. The laycan is firm, and the vessel is ready to load as per the schedule. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $48.75 is still a bit high for us. Could we meet at $47.00 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? We’d like to finalize this soon. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your patience. After discussing with the owner, we can agree to $47.50 per ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.50 per ton and $15,000 demurrage rate are acceptable. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your efforts. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement shortly. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the vessel will be ready at Houston as agreed. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah.
